name: Mudboy
description:
Mudboy's on his way to somewhere, but it seems danger is hiding around every corner. Can you help him escape? And what is Mudboy exactly? Only you can find out..

Created uniquely for the Weird Game Jam, July 2017.

Gameplay time: 10 - 20 minutes if playing for the first time

Features

  • 3 different environments, each with their own unique hazards
  • Checkpoints after every environment
  • Every environment gets a little faster, the music going along with Mudboy's steps
  • Challenging but not impossible hazards
  • Hazard-specific death messages (can you find the hidden extra way to die? Hint: rocky environment)
  • Music composed uniquely for the game

Controls

  • Point and click (further explained in the game)
  • Alt-enter to switch to fullscreen (this may make certain hazards much harder, because the mouse has to travel further)
  • Escape to exit instantly
